/StudentList.do = authc, roles[admin] /toEditStudent.do = authc, roles[admin] /toAddStudent.do = authc, roles[admin] /EditStudent.do = authc, roles[admin] /AddStudent.do = authc, roles[admin] /SelectStudent.do = authc, roles[admin] /StudentSuccess.do = authc, roles[admin] /TeacherList.do = authc, roles[admin] /toEditTeacher.do = authc, roles[admin] /toAddTeacher.do = authc, roles[admin] /EditTeacher.do = authc, roles[admin] /AddTeacher.do = authc, roles[admin] /SelectTeacher.do = authc, roles[admin] /ClassesList.do = authc, roles[admin] /toEditClasses.do = authc, roles[admin] /EditClasses.do = authc, roles[admin] /AddClasses.do = authc, roles[admin] /SelectClasses.do = authc, roles[admin]

/SelectedCourse.do = authc, roles[student] /RemoveSelectedCourse.do = authc, roles[student] /StudentsClassesList.do = authc, roles[student] /StudentIndex.do = authc, roles[student]
/index = anon
# 当访问login时，不用进行认证（anon表示匿名） /login = anon
/logout = logout
